TopicTitle: Is the this a feature or a bug?

Articles.Content:
Just a moment ago I transmitted some science and electric charge ran out while in the night side, so I warped to daylight but the batteries didn't get recharged.

Is this a new feature or is this a bug?
Well, it's hard to say. First, did you remember to include solar panels? Second, are they currently oriented towards the sun? Third, are you using mods?
The craft has 2 solar panels(one broke off). I found out why it wasn't charging, in the solar panel's RMB menu it said block by Kerbin.
It shouldn't be blocked by Kerbin if it isn't, well, blocked by Kerbin.
